000001.title: First Post Of Website Generator
000001.caption: An early screenshot of the website generator that made this post. Wow this took a while but im happy to have it functional.

000002.title: Green Stripe Color Analysis
000002.caption: Green Stripe by Matisse. looking at color relationships.

000003.title: Connecting the dots
000003.caption: My website now gets the data on my github page. It could also theoretically get any page with json data formated into posts. e.g. a social media feed.Right now the data flows from my python application to github pages then to my personal website. All with one click of a button!
